hero.title: City & county websites created in minutes.
hero.text: From news articles to event tickets, sightcms makes it easy to create a website your residents & visitors will love.

features.title: Built from the ground up for one specific purpose.
features.text: We made a platform with focus on the needs of local government units and their tourism associations.
features.feature_1_text: Create a website from predefined templates in a few simple steps. Choose from various modules and customize them to your needs..
features.feature_2_text: Attract more visitors with apps for Android & iOS, which connect to your website and allow users to access your content offline.
features.feature_3_text: Manage your content with sections for static pages, articles, events & more. Add writers and moderators and give them permissions

cta.title: Start your free trial today
cta.text: Try sightcms for 30 days. No credit card required.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Got a technical issue? Have a question about our subscription plans? Want to request a feature? Let us know.

forgot_password.text: Forgot your password? No problem. Just let us know your email address and we will email you a password reset link that will allow you to choose a new one.

verify_email.text: Thanks for signing up! Before getting started, could you verify your email address by clicking on the link we just emailed to you? If you didn't receive the email, we will gladly send you another.
verify_email.text_resent: A new verification link has been sent to the email address you provided during registration.

confirm_password.text: This is a secure area of the application. Please confirm your password before continuing.

domain.label: Domain

profile.verification_sent: A new verification link has been sent to your email address.

profile.delete_account_confirmation_text: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Please enter your password to confirm you would like to permanently delete your account.
